channel.title: Iraq on Talent KRD
channel.description: Recent content in Iraq on Talent KRD

item.title: From Zero to Freelancer: A 30-Day Action Plan for Beginners in Iraq
item.description: A concrete, day-by-day 30-day plan to go from zero freelancing experience to landing your first paid client from Iraq. No vague advice — specific actions for each day.

item.title: How to Start Freelancing from Iraq in 2026
item.description: A step-by-step guide to launching your freelancing career from Iraq. Covers platforms, payment methods, skill positioning, and how to land your first clients from Kurdistan and beyond.

item.title: Remote Work in Kurdistan: A Complete Guide
item.description: Everything you need to know about working remotely from Kurdistan — internet options, co-working spaces, legal considerations, and how to position yourself for international remote jobs.

item.title: Building Your First Website from Iraq: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: A complete, beginner-friendly guide to building and launching your first website from Iraq. Covers domain registration, hosting, WordPress setup, and making your site live — all with Iraq-specific advice.

item.title: How to Get Paid Online in Iraq: Payoneer, PayPal Alternatives & Crypto
item.description: A practical guide to receiving international payments in Iraq. Covers Payoneer, Wise, crypto options, and local workarounds that actually work in Kurdistan and the rest of Iraq.

item.title: Best VPN Services for Iraq in 2026 — Access Anything, Anywhere
item.description: Honest comparison of the best VPNs that actually work in Iraq and Kurdistan. Speed tests, pricing, and which ones reliably bypass restrictions in Erbil, Sulaymaniyah, and Baghdad.
